data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvajal, Máriom A., Faúndez, Eduardo I. (2013): Rediscovery of Sinopla humeralis Signoret, 1864 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Acanthosomatidae). Zootaxa 3637 (2): 190-196, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3637.2.10
